item.itunes:subtitle: White, Green, Card... we clarify them all for you.
item.description:
Welcome to Gun Talk, the podcast by Gun Owners South Africa to keep members informed about their rights, as well as news and edvelopments that may affect them.

For more podcasts, visit SolidGoldStudios.co.za/gosa
